channel.title: Kicks players straight away
channel.description:
Okay, so basically I have my server up and running for me to use and I have portfowarded and got all my IP's right.
The thing is that when my friend tries to join it, it says "REGISTERED ______" then 2 seconds later it will say "DEREGISTERED _____".
If you can help please post below ASAP.
